content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is critical that you follow all of EPAM’s Policies, and as a part of the EPAM Topaz team, client’s policies and processes for contractors.  Key links for EPAM resources include:  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Code of  Ethical Conduct\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/usa/all-cities.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Mandatory%20Training%20Program.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT Security Awareness and Date Privacy trainings\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You represent EPAM whenever you are working with our clients.  Accordingly, please ensure you are demonstrating our Core Values at all times.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The consequences of not following EPAM or client policies and processes are significant and could include termination of the EPAM contract with client, you and/or EPAM being held legally liable for a breach, removal from the Topaz account, and termination from EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
